pursuing a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science.
I have a profound interest in machine learning, operating

section.title: ~/About
section.description: Brief information about me and some of my interests.

bio: I am currently a 7th semester student at KLE Technological University, pursuing a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science. My journey has been marked by a strong focus on software development, machine learning, networking, and web development Under the guidance of my mentor, dr.Manohar madgi and M.M.raikar maam. In my 6th semester, I undertook a project related to these areas, learning and applying programming languages such as C/C++, Java, and Python.

I have a profound interest in various fields of software development, including machine learning, operating systems, and full-stack development. Beyond academics, I'm passionate about desk setups and PCs. In my free time, I enjoy playing and analyzing chess games, playing video games, and exploring local cuisines. My current goals include gaining practical experience and building valuable connections to support my personal and professional growth.

section.title: ~/Projects
section.description: Some of my most recent or past favorite creations or work.

project_items.project_name: Classification of Knee-Osteoarthritis using machine learning models.
project_items.description: Knee osteoarthritis is a degenerative disease of synovial joints characterized by focal loss of articular hyaline between Knee-joint.The objective of this project is to develop a image processing models for classifying knee osteoarthritis  based on severity level using knee Xray images.”

project_items.project_name: Detection and Mitigation of MITM Attack in V2G Network
project_items.description: A man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack is a cyberattack where an attacker inserts themselves into the communication between two parties.The V2G technology that enables energy to be pushed back to the power grid from the battery of an electric vehicle (EV).
An e-portfolio built with React.js that utilizes GitHub API. Designed for public use and easy configuration. The second iteration of my website.
